website_summaries.verdict: A microfiber cooling towel that comes in a 6-pack of different colors.
pros: A good buy for a family vacation
Different colors make them easy to keep straight
Each pack comes with a storage bag and a caribiner for easy carrying
Stays cold for a long time
cons: May need to be rinsed often if you sweat a lot
Salt makes this product less effective because it reduces evaporation

customer_reviews.title: Multiple cooling towels for great price.  Good value
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for family trip to Disney. I have been using while working in the yard & keeps me cool. Be aware of the towel size when comparing prices. These were larger than most.
customer_reviews.author: lsims

customer_reviews.title: These were great at disney in the August heat but wash them ...
customer_reviews.text: These were great at disney in the August heat but wash them first since the colors do come out when you soak them!
customer_reviews.author: Eliza G.

customer_reviews.title: Individual pouch and carabiner hook
customer_reviews.text: Alot of people have asked does these come with the pouch and carabiner hook this is 1 of the 6 I have. All 6 have pouch and carabiner hook they work GREAT. My husband uses his when working outside, our kids use there's when outside and I use mine at work one of the best buys yet
customer_reviews.author: Frozen

customer_reviews.title: Great cooling towels!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is second pack I’ve puchased in the last month! They are well made, stay cold and great price. Now we have enough for us and all of our grandchildren on hot days in PA!
customer_reviews.author: Reenie

customer_reviews.title: Keeping cool even in the Caribbean
customer_reviews.text: They are fabulous for the money. Just run water on them no matter the water's temperature the cool pads drop the temp. They do have the tendency to dry out pretty quickly unfortunately because they are so thin. But they require less than a cup to get cool again. I just got back from the Caribbean sun and they were pure genius.
customer_reviews.author: traveler1975

customer_reviews.title: Cooled neck/shoulder area much better than a cotton towel.
customer_reviews.text: Like that they were 6 colors. Worked in the hot sun for several days and everyone knew which one was theirs based on the color. Felt nice and cool wrapped around the face and neck. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: R. Kisic

customer_reviews.title: Work great!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these to have for outdoor activities in the summer. They have been lifesavers for family members and work well to keep us cool. I put ours in a ziploc bag in the fridge when we want to use them and they cool really fast. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Marty D.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps you cool!
customer_reviews.text: These towels kept the whole family nice and cool during our summer trips. They are easy to wash and the colors are very bright.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs S

customer_reviews.title: Great product to fight the heat.
customer_reviews.text: Superior results, stay soft, and so handy for hot summers. I love the variety pack, enough to keep one in a handbag and all our cars. Just dampen with water and snap, you are good to go. Easy to launder, too.
customer_reviews.author: mrsv

customer_reviews.title: Used in Honduras!
customer_reviews.text: Used these while in Honduras. Its kept the sun off our necks and cool at the same time. Wash them daily because they can smell after a day of heavy use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nothing Special
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I am doing it wrong, but I soaked it in icewater and when i used it it stayed cold for a little bit, but quickly lost it. Point being is it didn't seem to be any better than a regular towel.
customer_reviews.author: Chris L.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it for Florida vacation!
customer_reviews.text: Used these on our trip to Disney, had to wet them pretty often but I was 108 degrees so wouldn't expect not to have to. They did help a lot thoughwith the heat and I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon McCaughey

customer_reviews.title: nice cooling towels for the price
customer_reviews.text: I like the cool towels, only thing i did not like is they dry to fast, you have to wetting them.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Definitely works
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband who works in a factory that sometimes the temperature gets into triple digits. He said it definitely helped to be able to use these cooling towels on those days.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, good price. Quick delivery.
customer_reviews.text: Good cooling towel. First one I had, does the job!
customer_reviews.author: A Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I followed directions, but do not feel any cooling qualities to these towels at all. A waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: cathy cottrill

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: They actually work lol was very skeptical but they do cool you down
customer_reviews.author: Bambi

customer_reviews.title: They work ok
customer_reviews.text: Work ok , the marterial is the same as mesh basketball jersey shirt or shorts,
customer_reviews.author: G_RICHARDSON

customer_reviews.title: they keep you cool
customer_reviews.text: they are the right size, keep my neck cool durinf work out
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: Great price for an amazing product.
customer_reviews.text: On the hottest of summer days these towels were a must.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Cervantes

customer_reviews.title: Didn't stay cool.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like the towels because they didn't stay cool, at all! It was similar to a regular towel.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ashley Berger

product_meta.title: Crenics Cooling Towel 40x12 Inches, Ice Towel, Soft Breathable Chilly Towel, Microfiber Towel for Yoga, Sport, Running, Gym, Workout,Camping, Fitness & More Activities
feature_bullets: [Opponents of Heat ]- Hyper-evaporative breathable mesh material makes it easy to activate the chilling towel when you simply soak, wring out and snap it. The unique cooling system uses moisture from the towel to draw the sweat away from your skin to keep you cool. Everyone can use the cooling towel, even pets.

[Multipurpose Sports Towels] - It's perfect for sports fans into golf, swimming, football, workout, gym and fitness, also works for fever or headache therapy, heatstroke prevention, sunscreen protection, cooling while absorbing. Keep yourself cool during hot summer days, workout sessions, outdoor adventures or when someone has a migraine. If you are sweating a lot, rinse the 'salty water' out from time to time. Salt reduces evaporation/cooling rate.

[Keep Chills] - The towel stays chilled for up to 3 hours (depending on conditions). No chemicals are used in the making of the cooling towels. It's perfect for hot flashes, outdoor activities, indoor exercise, fever or headache therapy, heatstroke prevention, sunscreen protection, cooling while absorbing.

[Safe & Eco-Friendly ]- Each cooling towel has a 50 UPF rating to keep you protected for long hours in the sun. It can help with hot flashes, relaxing the nerves, and accelerating recovery. We do not waste material with bulky packaging and there are no chemicals or harmful products used in the manufacturing process.

[Our Service] - Our cooling towels are backed by a 100% guarantee you are fully satisfied with this product or your money back. Please feel free to reach out to us, and we will handle all your questions and/or issues!
